import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'rock-paper-scissors'; isOptionSelected = false; optionSelectedByFirstPlayer = ''; optionSelectedBySecondPlayer = '' matchFinished = false; constructor() {} public selectedOption(option:string){ console.log(option); this.isOptionSelected = true; this.optionSelectedByFirstPlayer = option; let aleatorio = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3); let icon = '' switch (key) { case 0: break; default: break; } } }
